  1) Edit an existing working set from package view.
  2) Select and Unselect a project -> Finish button is enabled now.
  3) Press Finish -> see result below

actually, I could not reproduce it by creating a new working set. It's 
maybe 'just' an incompatibility issue of the working sets?

problem is that workbench passes different event.datas depending on the working
set   event (name changed, content changed, content replace). It seems that they
send out name change event when you edit even though the name stays the same.

Fixed. Available in builds > 20020429
